subject: Track and Field
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Nearly even with his American counterpart on the final leg, the Jamaican sprinter pulled away with an astonishing 8.79 second split time at the Penn Relays.
snippet: Nearly even with his American counterpart on the final leg, the Jamaican sprinter pulled away with an astonishing 8.79 second split time at the Penn Relays.
